message: "Even when a sex trafficking crime is identified, it is difficult to investigate, and just as difficult to prosecute. Many of the victims blame themselves, sometimes even defending those who trafficked them, Jordan said."

data.description: WILMINGTON — The latest statistics put North Carolina as 8th in the nation for human trafficking cases, which include sex trafficking. But what those numbers don’t show is a crime that is more…
data.title: Part One: We have a sex-trafficking problem. The numbers don’t begin to tell the story | Port City Daily
